00099 DdNode *
00100 Cudd_addIte(
00101   DdManager * dd,
00102   DdNode * f,
00103   DdNode * g,
00104   DdNode * h)
00105 {
00106     DdNode *res;
00107 
00108     do {
00109         dd->reordered = 0;
00110         res = cuddAddIteRecur(dd,f,g,h);
00111     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00112     return(res);
00113 
00114 } /* end of Cudd_addIte */

00133 DdNode *
00134 Cudd_addIteConstant(
00135   DdManager * dd,
00136   DdNode * f,
00137   DdNode * g,
00138   DdNode * h)
00139 {
00140     DdNode *one,*zero;
00141     DdNode *Fv,*Fnv,*Gv,*Gnv,*Hv,*Hnv,*r,*t,*e;
00142     unsigned int topf,topg,toph,v;
00143 
00144     /* Trivial cases. */
00145     if (f == (one = DD_ONE(dd))) {      /* ITE(1,G,H) = G */
00146         return(g);
00147     }
00148     if (f == (zero = DD_ZERO(dd))) {    /* ITE(0,G,H) = H */
00149         return(h);
00150     }
00151 
00152     /* From now on, f is known not to be a constant. */
00153     addVarToConst(f,&g,&h,one,zero);
00154 
00155     /* Check remaining one variable cases. */
00156     if (g == h) {                       /* ITE(F,G,G) = G */
00157         return(g);
00158     }
00159     if (cuddIsConstant(g) && cuddIsConstant(h)) {
00160         return(DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00161     }
00162 
00163     topf = cuddI(dd,f->index);
00164     topg = cuddI(dd,g->index);
00165     toph = cuddI(dd,h->index);
00166     v = ddMin(topg,toph);
00167 
00168     /* ITE(F,G,H) = (x,G,H) (non constant) if F = (x,1,0), x < top(G,H). */
00169     if (topf < v && cuddIsConstant(cuddT(f)) && cuddIsConstant(cuddE(f))) {
00170         return(DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00171     }
00172 
00173     /* Check cache. */
00174     r = cuddConstantLookup(dd,Cudd_addIteConstant,f,g,h);
00175     if (r != NULL) {
00176         return(r);
00177     }
00178 
00179     /* Compute cofactors. */
00180     if (topf <= v) {
00181         v = ddMin(topf,v);      /* v = top_var(F,G,H) */
00182         Fv = cuddT(f); Fnv = cuddE(f);
00183     } else {
00184         Fv = Fnv = f;
00185     }
00186     if (topg == v) {
00187         Gv = cuddT(g); Gnv = cuddE(g);
00188     } else {
00189         Gv = Gnv = g;
00190     }
00191     if (toph == v) {
00192         Hv = cuddT(h); Hnv = cuddE(h);
00193     } else {
00194         Hv = Hnv = h;
00195     }
00196     
00197     /* Recursive step. */
00198     t = Cudd_addIteConstant(dd,Fv,Gv,Hv);
00199     if (t == DD_NON_CONSTANT || !cuddIsConstant(t)) {
00200         cuddCacheInsert(dd, Cudd_addIteConstant, f, g, h, DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00201         return(DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00202     }
00203     e = Cudd_addIteConstant(dd,Fnv,Gnv,Hnv);
00204     if (e == DD_NON_CONSTANT || !cuddIsConstant(e) || t != e) {
00205         cuddCacheInsert(dd, Cudd_addIteConstant, f, g, h, DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00206         return(DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00207     }
00208     cuddCacheInsert(dd,Cudd_addIteConstant,f,g,h,t);
00209     return(t);
00210 
00211 } /* end of Cudd_addIteConstant */

00229 DdNode *
00230 Cudd_addEvalConst(
00231   DdManager * dd,
00232   DdNode * f,
00233   DdNode * g)
00234 {
00235     DdNode *zero;
00236     DdNode *Fv,*Fnv,*Gv,*Gnv,*r,*t,*e;
00237     unsigned int topf,topg;
00238     DdNode *(*cacheOp)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *, DdNode *);
00239 
00240 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00241     assert(!Cudd_IsComplement(f));
00242 #endif
00243 
00244     /* Terminal cases. */
00245     if (f == DD_ONE(dd) || cuddIsConstant(g)) {
00246         return(g);
00247     }
00248     if (f == (zero = DD_ZERO(dd))) {
00249         return(dd->background);
00250     }
00251 
00252 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00253     assert(!cuddIsConstant(f));
00254 #endif
00255     /* From now on, f and g are known not to be constants. */
00256 
00257     topf = cuddI(dd,f->index);
00258     topg = cuddI(dd,g->index);
00259 
00260     /* Check cache. */
00261     cacheOp = (DdNode *(*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *, DdNode *))
00262         Cudd_addEvalConst;
00263     r = cuddConstantLookup(dd,cacheOp,f,g,g);
00264     if (r != NULL) {
00265         return(r);
00266     }
00267 
00268     /* Compute cofactors. */
00269     if (topf <= topg) {
00270         Fv = cuddT(f); Fnv = cuddE(f);
00271     } else {
00272         Fv = Fnv = f;
00273     }
00274     if (topg <= topf) {
00275         Gv = cuddT(g); Gnv = cuddE(g);
00276     } else {
00277         Gv = Gnv = g;
00278     }
00279     
00280     /* Recursive step. */
00281     if (Fv != zero) {
00282         t = Cudd_addEvalConst(dd,Fv,Gv);
00283         if (t == DD_NON_CONSTANT || !cuddIsConstant(t)) {
00284             cuddCacheInsert2(dd, Cudd_addEvalConst, f, g, DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00285             return(DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00286         }
00287         if (Fnv != 0) {
00288             e = Cudd_addEvalConst(dd,Fnv,Gnv);
00289             if (e == DD_NON_CONSTANT || !cuddIsConstant(e) || t != e) {
00290                 cuddCacheInsert2(dd, Cudd_addEvalConst, f, g, DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00291                 return(DD_NON_CONSTANT);
00292             }
00293         }
00294         cuddCacheInsert2(dd,Cudd_addEvalConst,f,g,t);
00295         return(t);
00296     } else { /* Fnv must be != zero */
00297         e = Cudd_addEvalConst(dd,Fnv,Gnv);
00298         cuddCacheInsert2(dd, Cudd_addEvalConst, f, g, e);
00299         return(e);
00300     }
00301 
00302 } /* end of Cudd_addEvalConst */

00318 DdNode *
00319 Cudd_addCmpl(
00320   DdManager * dd,
00321   DdNode * f)
00322 {
00323     DdNode *res;
00324 
00325     do {
00326         dd->reordered = 0;
00327         res = cuddAddCmplRecur(dd,f);
00328     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00329     return(res);
00330 
00331 } /* end of Cudd_addCmpl */

00346 int
00347 Cudd_addLeq(
00348   DdManager * dd,
00349   DdNode * f,
00350   DdNode * g)
00351 {
00352     DdNode *tmp, *fv, *fvn, *gv, *gvn;
00353     unsigned int topf, topg, res;
00354 
00355     /* Terminal cases. */
00356     if (f == g) return(1);
00357 
00358     if (Cudd_IsConstant(f)) {
00359         if (Cudd_IsConstant(g)) return(cuddV(f) <= cuddV(g));
00360         if (f == DD_MINUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(1);
00361         if (f == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(0); /* since f != g */
00362     }
00363     if (g == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(1);
00364     if (g == DD_MINUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(0); /* since f != g */
00365 
00366     /* Check cache. */
00367     tmp = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,(DdNode * (*)(DdManager *, DdNode *,
00368                            DdNode *))Cudd_addLeq,f,g);
00369     if (tmp != NULL) {
00370         return(tmp == DD_ONE(dd));
00371     }
00372 
00373     /* Compute cofactors. One of f and g is not constant. */
00374     topf = cuddI(dd,f->index);
00375     topg = cuddI(dd,g->index);
00376     if (topf <= topg) {
00377         fv = cuddT(f); fvn = cuddE(f);
00378     } else {
00379         fv = fvn = f;
00380     }
00381     if (topg <= topf) {
00382         gv = cuddT(g); gvn = cuddE(g);
00383     } else {
00384         gv = gvn = g;
00385     }
00386 
00387     res = Cudd_addLeq(dd,fvn,gvn) && Cudd_addLeq(dd,fv,gv);
00388 
00389     /* Store result in cache and return. */
00390     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,(DdNode * (*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *))
00391                      Cudd_addLeq,f,g,Cudd_NotCond(DD_ONE(dd),res==0));
00392     return(res);
00393 
00394 } /* end of Cudd_addLeq */

00415 DdNode *
00416 cuddAddIteRecur(
00417   DdManager * dd,
00418   DdNode * f,
00419   DdNode * g,
00420   DdNode * h)
00421 {
00422     DdNode *one,*zero;
00423     DdNode *r,*Fv,*Fnv,*Gv,*Gnv,*Hv,*Hnv,*t,*e;
00424     unsigned int topf,topg,toph,v;
00425     int index = 0;
00426 
00427     /* Trivial cases. */
00428 
00429     /* One variable cases. */
00430     if (f == (one = DD_ONE(dd))) {      /* ITE(1,G,H) = G */
00431         return(g);
00432     }
00433     if (f == (zero = DD_ZERO(dd))) {    /* ITE(0,G,H) = H */
00434         return(h);
00435     }
00436 
00437     /* From now on, f is known to not be a constant. */
00438     addVarToConst(f,&g,&h,one,zero);
00439 
00440     /* Check remaining one variable cases. */
00441     if (g == h) {                       /* ITE(F,G,G) = G */
00442         return(g);
00443     }
00444 
00445     if (g == one) {                     /* ITE(F,1,0) = F */
00446         if (h == zero) return(f);
00447     }
00448 
00449     topf = cuddI(dd,f->index);
00450     topg = cuddI(dd,g->index);
00451     toph = cuddI(dd,h->index);
00452     v = ddMin(topg,toph);
00453 
00454     /* A shortcut: ITE(F,G,H) = (x,G,H) if F=(x,1,0), x < top(G,H). */
00455     if (topf < v && cuddT(f) == one && cuddE(f) == zero) {
00456         r = cuddUniqueInter(dd,(int)f->index,g,h);
00457         return(r);
00458     }
00459     if (topf < v && cuddT(f) == zero && cuddE(f) == one) {
00460         r = cuddUniqueInter(dd,(int)f->index,h,g);
00461         return(r);
00462     }
00463 
00464     /* Check cache. */
00465     r = cuddCacheLookup(dd,Cudd_addIte,f,g,h);
00466     if (r != NULL) {
00467         return(r);
00468     }
00469 
00470     /* Compute cofactors. */
00471     if (topf <= v) {
00472         v = ddMin(topf,v);      /* v = top_var(F,G,H) */
00473         index = f->index;
00474         Fv = cuddT(f); Fnv = cuddE(f);
00475     } else {
00476         Fv = Fnv = f;
00477     }
00478     if (topg == v) {
00479         index = g->index;
00480         Gv = cuddT(g); Gnv = cuddE(g);
00481     } else {
00482         Gv = Gnv = g;
00483     }
00484     if (toph == v) {
00485         index = h->index;
00486         Hv = cuddT(h); Hnv = cuddE(h);
00487     } else {
00488         Hv = Hnv = h;
00489     }
00490     
00491     /* Recursive step. */
00492     t = cuddAddIteRecur(dd,Fv,Gv,Hv);
00493     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00494     cuddRef(t);
00495 
00496     e = cuddAddIteRecur(dd,Fnv,Gnv,Hnv);
00497     if (e == NULL) {
00498         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,t);
00499         return(NULL);
00500     }
00501     cuddRef(e);
00502 
00503     r = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd,index,t,e);
00504     if (r == NULL) {
00505         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,t);
00506         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,e);
00507         return(NULL);
00508     }
00509     cuddDeref(t);
00510     cuddDeref(e);
00511 
00512     cuddCacheInsert(dd,Cudd_addIte,f,g,h,r);
00513 
00514     return(r);
00515 
00516 } /* end of cuddAddIteRecur */

00531 DdNode *
00532 cuddAddCmplRecur(
00533   DdManager * dd,
00534   DdNode * f)
00535 {
00536     DdNode *one,*zero;
00537     DdNode *r,*Fv,*Fnv,*t,*e;
00538 
00539     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00540     zero = DD_ZERO(dd); 
00541 
00542     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00543         if (f == zero) {
00544             return(one);
00545         } else {
00546             return(zero);
00547         }
00548     }
00549     r = cuddCacheLookup1(dd,Cudd_addCmpl,f);
00550     if (r != NULL) {
00551         return(r);
00552     }
00553     Fv = cuddT(f);
00554     Fnv = cuddE(f);
00555     t = cuddAddCmplRecur(dd,Fv);
00556     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00557     cuddRef(t);
00558     e = cuddAddCmplRecur(dd,Fnv);
00559     if (e == NULL) {
00560         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,t);
00561         return(NULL);
00562     }
00563     cuddRef(e);
00564     r = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd,(int)f->index,t,e);
00565     if (r == NULL) {
00566         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00567         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
00568         return(NULL);
00569     }
00570     cuddDeref(t);
00571     cuddDeref(e);
00572     cuddCacheInsert1(dd,Cudd_addCmpl,f,r);
00573     return(r);
00574 
00575 } /* end of cuddAddCmplRecur */

00582 
00593 static void
00594 addVarToConst(
00595   DdNode * f,
00596   DdNode ** gp,
00597   DdNode ** hp,
00598   DdNode * one,
00599   DdNode * zero)
00600 {
00601     DdNode *g = *gp;
00602     DdNode *h = *hp;
00603 
00604     if (f == g) { /* ITE(F,F,H) = ITE(F,1,H) = F + H */
00605         *gp = one;
00606     }
00607 
00608     if (f == h) { /* ITE(F,G,F) = ITE(F,G,0) = F * G */
00609         *hp = zero;
00610     }
00611 
00612 } /* end of addVarToConst */
